CMP-P-PROJECT-VISION-KEY.name: cmp-p-project-vision
CMP-P-PROJECT-VISION-KEY.description: oci-oneoe Production environment, vision service project compartment

GRP-P-PROJECT-VISION-ADMINS.name: grp-p-project-vision-admins
GRP-P-PROJECT-VISION-ADMINS.description: Landing Zone Prod, Vision Service Project Administrators Group.

PCY-P-PROJECT-VISION-ADMINS.name: pcy-p-project-vision-admins

statements: allow group grp-p-project-vision-admins to manage ai-service-vision-family in compartment cmp-landingzone-p:cmp-lzp-prod:cmp-lzp-p-projects:cmp-p-project-vision
allow group grp-p-project-vision-admins to manage object-family in compartment cmp-landingzone-p:cmp-lzp-prod:cmp-lzp-p-projects:cmp-p-project-vision
allow group grp-p-project-vision-admins to use tag-namespaces in tenancy
